name: Kenneth Eslinger
coverLetter:
Hi there,
I'm a dedicated worker with a strong work ethic and about seven years of indoor trimming experience. I also have two or so years of managing a cannabis farm. (I grew up in a small farm as well) I enjoy the environment and the people within the cannabis industry and am really striving for a career in the field. I average two plus pounds a day of dense nug material. I hope this has been enough to entice you to pick me up. 
Thank you,
Kenneth Eslinger
781-656-4636
contact: I prefer text message but calls are okay too. @781-656-4636
